Divisions — 2008-2010 (sorted by turnout)

In the Australian Parliament a vote is called a division. Through these votes, elected members shape legislation that affects us all. Learn more...

Both houses Representatives Senate
2013 (current) 2010-2013 2008-2010 2004-2007 All Parliaments

    30 Dec 2009 at 12:00 Senate

    Proceedural ban of flatulence during divisions

    • No rebellions

About the Project

The Public Whip is brought to you by the not-for-profit OpenAustralia Foundation. It is based on the UK site of the same name.

If you'd like to talk to us about the project, please email us.

Other projects by us that you might find interesting:
OpenAustralia, Election Leaflets, Right To Know and Planning Alerts.
